statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies;
SELECT company_name, employee_count FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies;
SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT company_name, employee_count FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT id, company_name, employee_count FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE employee_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, employee_count FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE employee_count > 1000;
SELECT id, company_name, location FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE waste_management_practices LIKE '%recycling%';
SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE location IN ('China', 'India') ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_companies, AVG(employee_count) AS average_employees FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies;
SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_records WHERE waste_generated > 100;
SELECT company_name, waste_management_practices FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE waste_management_practices = 'Recycling';
SELECT company_name, SUM(waste_generated) AS total_generated_waste FROM waste_management_records GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT company_id, company_name, waste_management_practices FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies WHERE waste_management_practices LIKE '%recycled%';
SELECT company_id, company_name, SUM(waste_generated) AS total_waste_generated FROM waste_management_records WHERE waste_generated > 100 GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT company_id, company_name, waste_disposed FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies ORDER BY waste_disposed DESC;

SELECT company_name, waste_generated, waste_disposed, waste_recycled FROM plastic_manufacturing_companies LEFT JOIN waste_management_records ON plastic_manufacturing_companies.company_id = waste_management_records.company_id WHERE waste_generated > waste_disposed AND waste_recycled = 0;
SELECT * FROM plastic_companies
SELECT company_name, location FROM plastic_companies WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT log_date, waste_type, waste_quantity FROM waste_management_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT company_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM plastic_companies INNER JOIN company_contacts ON plastic_companies.company_id = company_contacts.company_id

SELECT company_name, SUM(waste_quantity) AS total_waste FROM plastic_companies INNER JOIN waste_management_logs ON plastic_companies.company_id = waste_management_logs.company_id GROUP BY company_name
SELECT * FROM plastic_companies WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, location FROM plastic_companies WHERE waste_management_practices LIKE '%recycling%' ORDER BY company_id;

SELECT pc.company_name, wml.log_date, wml.waste_type, wml.waste_quantity FROM plastic_companies pc INNER JOIN waste_management_logs wml ON pc.company_id = wml.company_id WHERE wml.waste_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY wml.waste_quantity DESC;

SELECT cc.contact_name, cc.contact_email, pc.company_name FROM company_contacts cc INNER JOIN plastic_companies pc ON cc.company_id = pc.company_id WHERE cc.contact_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY cc.contact_name;

SELECT pc.company_name, wml.waste_type, wml.log_date FROM plastic_companies pc LEFT JOIN waste_management_logs wml ON pc.company_id = wml.company_id WHERE wml.waste_type = 'Plastic' AND wml.log_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY wml.log_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, company_name, location, waste_type FROM plastic_companies;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity, company_id FROM waste_bins ORDER BY bin_capacity DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date, disposal_method, disposal_cost FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collected_waste_type, bin_id FROM waste_collection WHERE collected_waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM waste_bins WHERE company_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM plastic_companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM plastic_companies WHERE waste_type = 'Recyclable';
SELECT * FROM waste_bins ORDER BY bin_capacity DESC;

SELECT company_name, bin_location, disposal_cost FROM plastic_companies JOIN waste_bins ON plastic_companies.company_id = waste_bins.company_id JOIN waste_collection ON waste_bins.bin_id = waste_collection.bin_id JOIN waste_disposal ON waste_collection.collection_id = waste_disposal.collection_id WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' AND disposal_cost > 100;

SELECT company_name, SUM(disposal_cost) AS total_cost FROM plastic_companies JOIN waste_bins ON plastic_companies.company_id = waste_bins.company_id JOIN waste_collection ON waste_bins.bin_id = waste_collection.bin_id JOIN waste_disposal ON waste_collection.collection_id = waste_disposal.collection_id GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Plastic_Companies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_method, amount_collected FROM Waste_Management WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT center_name, location, accepted_materials FROM Recycling_Centers WHERE center_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Environmental_Impact ORDER BY impact_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM Plastic_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Plastic_Companies WHERE waste_production > 1000;
SELECT center_name, location FROM Recycling_Centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, company_id, collection_date FROM Waste_Reports WHERE report_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT company_name, impact_type, impact_rating FROM Plastic_Companies JOIN Environmental_Impact ON Plastic_Companies.company_id = Environmental_Impact.company_id;
